text:
V S PRAVEEN
Email: vspraveen1132@gmail.com					 

Phone:  +91-8639524955



PROFILE SUMMARY:	

· Having 6 years of experience in Salesforce.com CRM, Force.com platform as Developer and Administrator.
· Experience in Requirement Capturing from client, Designing, Development, Testing and Deploying Sales force applications.
· Experience in working on Sales Cloud and Service Cloud
· Expertise in Salesforce.com CRM, Force.com, Apex Classes, and Apex triggers, Visual force, Force.com API, SOQL and SOSL.
· Experience in customizing standard objects, creating roles and Profiles and configured the permissions based on the organizational hierarchy.
· Designed custom Formula Fields, Validation Rules, Field Dependencies, Workflows, Approval Processes, Page layouts and search layout.
· Implemented security and sharing rules at object, field, and record level for different users at different levels of organization, also created various profiles and configured the permissions based on the organizational hierarchy.
· Experience on Eclipse IDE with Force.com Plug-in for writing business logic in Apex programming language, Visual Force.
· Experience in Batch Processing (Batch Apex) with scheduling (Manual & Automated).
· Extensive experience in writing Test classes and Test Coverage for all the apex classes designed.
· Involved in Code review, to improve performance tuning and code optimization.
· Experience with Agile Methodology Development (Scrum Methodology).
· Developed SFDC Customized Reports and Dashboards.
· Experience working with Force.com IDE, Data Loader, Import Wizard and salesforce.com Sandbox Environments.
· Having good communication and interpersonal skills.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:

· Worked as a Software Developer in Red Berry Software Technologies Pvt. Ltd. from November 2012 to May 2016.
· Worked as a Senior Enterprise Solution Developer in UST Global from June 2016 to July 2017.
· Working as Senior Software Engineer in YBR Infotechs Pvt. Ltd. from August 2017 to till date.
TECHNICAL SKILLS:

	Programming Languages
	Apex, Visual Force

	Web Technologies
	HTML, Java Script, CSS 

	Platforms                            
	Force.com 

	Development Tools              
	Force IDE, Salesforce.com console, Eclipse

	Data Migration Tool            
	Apex Data Loader (GUI & Command Line), Workbench  

	Migration/Deployment Tools
	Change Set, Force.com IDE, Eclipse, ANT, Perforce

	Integration knowledge
	SOAP, REST




CERTIFICATIONS:

· Salesforce.com Certified Platform Developer I
ACADEMIC PROFILE:

· Completed M. Tech. (E.C.E) from Koneru Lakshmaiah University, 2012 with 8.1 CGPA.

PROJECTS PROFILE:

Project 1
Title 				: 	RFO
Client 				: 	Dell Solutions
Role 				: 	Design & Implementation
Architecture             		: 	MVC
Environment 			: 	Salesforce, apex and Visual force, HTML, JS, CSS etc.,
Solution Components 		:  	Force.com (SFDC), Order Tracking System (DELL), 
Team Size 			: 	8
Project Description:  
DELL is one of the big products based Million $ business company in US. DELL is building a new salesforce application to sell their products to their customers based on Order with specific line of business. In this project an EMI process was built for client to generate the billing schedules. A standard salesforce approval process has been implemented for DELL Product availability and status updates. 
Responsibilities:
· Daily client calls and task updates.
· Requirement Analysis and estimations.
· Design Approach.
· User setup, security Model and Salesforce Customizations.
· Report Building and Dashboards 
· Visual force Pages and Apex class functionality
· Unit Testing
· Deployment and Task status Update.

Project 2
Title 				: 	Product Management System 
Client 				: 	BTU Solutions
Role 				: 	Administrator and Developer
Architecture             		:            	MVC
Environment 			: 	Salesforce, apex and Visual force, HTML, JS etc.,
Solution Components        	:  	Force.com (SFDC) 
Team Size 			: 	4
Project Description:
In this Project, all the products in the organization are to be displayed in their website. Each product has a primary photo, description, price book associated with it. We need to display them in their website. Developed a site in salesforce.com to display their products with pictures and embedded it in their style sheet. Also implemented search criteria on category based and user search.

Responsibilities:
· Requirement analysis and estimations
· Design Approach
· Salesforce customization (Force.com Sites)
· Apex coding & Unit Testing
· Visual force Development
Project 3
Title				:	NetApp GTM  
Client				:	NetApp
Role				:	Developer and Administrator
Architecture			:	MVC
Environment			:	Salesforce, Apex and Visual force Programming
Solution Components		:	Force.com (SFDC)
Team Size			:	15

Description:  
NetApp is an American multinational storage and data management company. NetApp offers software, systems and services to manage and store data, including its proprietary Data ONTAP operating system.
Over View:
· NetApp Salesforce CRM is a sales cloud application which takes care of sales cycle.
· Salesforce application is mainly used by NetApp internal employees, their partners and distributors. Salesforce is widely used by sales Rep, system engineers, hire management users and marketing users.
· Main flow is Lead - >Contact->Account->Opportunity.
Responsibilities:  
· Performed the roles of Salesforce.com Developer and Administrator in the organization
· Worked with standard Salesforce.com objects like Accounts, Contacts, Leads and Opportunities
· Created workflow rules and related them to tasks, email alerts and field updates
· Implemented pick lists, dependent pick lists, lookups, master detail relationships, validation and formula fields to the custom objects
· Used Data Loader for insert, update, and bulk import or export of data from Salesforce.com objects. Used it to extract, and load data from comma separated values (CSV) files.
· Involved in the Deploy the components by using package.xml through Eclipse, Perforce and Ant tools.
Project 4

Project Name       		: 	HMS (Hospital Management System)
Client                     		: 	Dominion Medical Centers, Canada 
Role                         		: 	Sales force Developer                                                                                        Environment         		:	Force.com, Changesets, and Internet Cloud                                                                              Environment, Data Loader, Eclipse

Project Description:

This project will automate the daily operations of Dominion Medical Centers. The project keeps track of the staff and patient (in-patient, out-patient) details. It also takes care of the ward, medical, invoice and the doctor's appointment details. It provides easy access to critical information thus enabling the management to take better decisions on time. This project deals with processing of each and every department in the hospital. The details of Doctor and staff help the hospital to maintain the record of every person. The billing system provides an efficient way for calculating bill details of the patients. 
Responsibilities:
· Source analyzing and validation.
· Interaction with primary requester (Client) for Requirements gathering, analysis, design, creating packages, test and Implementation.
· Worked with the user group for requirement gathering throughout the planning and implementation.
· Worked with various salesforce.com Standard objects like Accounts, Contacts, Leads, Cases, Campaigns, Reports, and Dashboards.
· Defined Org wide default to restrict access from users. 
· Created Workflow Rules to automate Tasks, Email Alerts, Field Updates, time-dependent actions.
· Designed & Developed Apex Classes, Controller Classes, extensions and Apex Triggers for various functional needs in the application.
· Used SOQL & SOSL with consideration to Governor Limits for data manipulation needs of the application using platform database objects.
· Strictly maintained Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture throughout the application.
· Responsible for all the activities related to configuring Data Loader, uploading data in CSV files into salesforce.com, checking for the correctness of the data.
· Packaged and Deployed customizations from Sandbox to other environments using Force.com IDES.  
Project 5

Project Name       		: 	CRM (Customer Relationship Management)
Client                      		: 	Ross Medical Group Denver, USA
Role                         		: 	Sales force Programmer                                                              Environment         		:	Force.com, Change sets, and Internet Cloud Environment, Data Loader

Project Description:                                                  
CRM (Customer Relationship Management) is to assist or guide a sales person to contact customers on a scheduled date & record the output of the particular follow up which is assigned to particular sales person, it also deals with order got by a sales person, orders lost to competitors. It also handles data about customers and competitors. It helps us to calculate the market share of the products in the particular region; it helps us to know the performance of sales person. It is of utmost importance because it also conveys to the user that the order lost at the order stage, quotation stage or at enquiry stage. It also maintains the records of Enquiry, Quotations, Order, Invoice and Payment Tracking. 
Roles and Responsibilities: 
· Source analyzing and validation.
· Preparing Objects, Profiles and Fields for the structure needs.
· Analyzed and Implemented the Security model (Object level, Field level and Record level) using Profiles, Roles and Sharing Model (Organizational-wide defaults & Sharing rules) settings.
· Implemented Case Management like Email-To-Case, Web-To-Case etc.
· Designed and developed Workflow rules for generating mails and Tasks & Approval Process for approvals.
· Developed Apex Classes, Triggers, Components and Visual force pages for applying the business logic on Database events.
· Strictly maintained Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture throughout the application.
· Developed Deployment Strategy and deployed the application to SIT, Training, UAT and Production environments smoothly using Force.com IDE, Change Sets.
· Interacting with Primary Requester (client) for requirements gathering, analysis, design, development, test and Implementation.
· Tested Documents, which include doing a Quality check on the created Objects. In the process the Objects are tested for the compliance with CLIENT policies and Procedures & CLIENT standards.
